name: Hypnotica Quest
description:
Welcome to Hypnotica Quest! You find yourself in a strange little sleepy town that is obsessed with hypnosis. Your curiosity gets the better of you and you sign up for an experiment at the laboratory at the end of the street.

This is a little walking simulator game where you get to experience actual hypnosis, giant rats, magical guinea pigs and meet the famous (or rather) infamous Doctor Voldritch.

name: Visit Bloofpiter Today
description: Doctor Yakov Voldritch can't afford to rent his evil diabolical mind control lab and so he must take on a research mission by the Great God Bloof (God of the fluffy alien bunny people) to pay it off by logging strange organisms. You will come across many fancy mushrooms, strange hypnotic blobs, dog worms and even (yes!) some spooky horror (be warned).

name: Totally Spies! Cyber Mission
description:
Totally Spies! Cyber Mission is a brand-new story set in the world of the new Season 7 of the Totally Spies! series.

Playing as Sam, Clover and Alex, players will be plunged into the heart of Singapore, where every street and every corner holds secrets to be discovered. Whether playing solo or in local multiplayer mode for up to three players, they will have the opportunity to master the art of infiltration, solve complex puzzles and, thanks to a variety of fashionable gadgets, save the world with style!

name: Aery: Best of Bundle
description:
This bundle features 5 exciting games of the Aery series. These games are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul while following an exciting story.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.
Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.

name: Euphoria Games Bundle
description: This bundle features 5 terrifying horror games. It includes some of the best and most horrifying pieces of art ever created by Euphoria Games. Are you ready to face your deepest fears?

name: Marble Mechanics
description: An immersive VR experience, invites you to construct a marble run and simulate the mechanics of marbles running on the track. The track consists of elements that are easily customizable by simply grabbing them. From funnels and loops to spirals, splitters, and both vertical and horizontal turns, these track elements can automatically align themselves for a smooth marble run, making construction fast and easy. Group track elements together so you can grab the entire group. You have the ability to duplicate and delete individual track elements or entire groups, and save favorite groups to the Track Box for reuse at any time. Infinite undo/redo functionality is always available, and you can save your favorite runs for sharing, restoring, and simulating later.

name: Grocery Store Simulator
description: Run your own grocery store. Scan items, place and stock shelves, set prices, order products, manage your warehouse, and customize your store. Play solo or team up with friends in a 4 player co-op mode to expand your business in this first-person game.

name: Breaking Time
description: Breaking Time is a singleplayer first-person speedrun platformer game where the player's goal is to complete the game level in record time, progressing through a world that itself is fractured in time.

name: KEABE: Kill ‚ÄôEm All - Bunny Edition
description: TPS, PVP, Online Multiplayer with cute stuffed animal characters and Big Guns. Colorful cyberpunk map with hologram surfaces and Red Matrix.

name: Thunder Age
description: In the flooded future world, mankind has built floating islands where electricity is harnessed during the raging thunderstorms. This unstable energy is crucial for survival, but also poses the greatest risk in this Tower Defense game.

name: The Littlest Fry
description: You are a small goldfish who has to protect a youngling while discovering how unforgiving the ponds in the wilderness are. Your objective is to defend a baby fish from predators while out maneuvering them while evading other obstacles that may be in your way while searching for safer waters.

name: The Ethernal Spiral
description: The Eternal Spiral is an immersive fantasy action RPG that blends intense combat, with an interesting time loop mechanic that ensures that every time playing feels unique.

name: Epic Quest
description: Epic Quest is a singleplayer game stylized after classic 8-bit JRPG games of the 1980s. You are tasked with defeating the dreadful Disciple of Antisexuality. Explore a mysterious world, recruit mercenaries into your party, and fight terrible monsters!

name: Light Reforged
description: Light Reforged features Baldr, the god of wisdom and light, as he travels the Nine Realms to rid the world of technology that was designed by Loki and is slowly bewitching the realms. Exploring vibrant and technological worlds while defeating a variety of opponents.

name: Maze TD Battleground
description: Use your towers to build a maze to kite the enemies to make more damage. But don't block their way or they will go aggro on you! Use the checkpoints to have the enemies walk longer routes through your maze. Build your own maps in the map editor.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Friedrichshafen
description: This scenery represents the latest status of development of the real airport. The buildings, the layout of the runways and taxiways as well as the Navaids are exactly as they are in reality.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Manchester
description: Explore the Airport Manchester - the largest British airport outside the London metropolitan region.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Troms√∏
description: With Troms√∏ XP, Jo Erlend Sund and Stairport Sceneries have created another beautiful Norwegian airport scenery for X-Plane. This scenery depicts an extremely detailed recreation of Troms√∏ Airport on the island Troms√∏ya as well as its surroundings.

description: The first chapter in the FUTURE SAGA series depicts an unprecedented alteration of history! Includes new Playable Characters, new Extra Missions, Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, and Costumes!

description: Build your own car and go racing.

description: The TopSpin 2K25 - Under the Lights Pack features Serena Williams and Roger Federer Alternate Outfits, Wilson Nightfall Bundle, and Night-Time Majors.

description: Season 3 Episode 8: Divinity War! Peter strikes a deal with a certain banned God while his friends deal with the monster terrorizing Hella City.

name: Carceri
description: Carceri [car-chair-e], noun: Vibrant first-person explorer. Secret-filled sorta-open world. Chaotic Art-toy. Charming story about being trapped in jail, forever. Also, the Italian word for "prisons." Escape today!

name: Exploraci√≥n: Casa Barroso

description: This Pro Mod Pack includes (2) Pro Modified type vehicles, with big tires and wheelie bars, and (2) Radial 315 versions of these vehicles with no Wheelie bars. The Pro Mods are the fastest door cars and include engine swaps for domestic engines.

name: Monster Blitz
description: "Monster Blitz" thrusts players into fast-paced arena battles across three distinct battlegrounds teeming with monstrous foes. Armed with powerful spells and aided by power-ups, players must survive relentless waves of nightmarish creatures.

You have to collect all the dolls while avoiding the bizarre phenomena and complete the ritual of ‚ÄúHitori Hide-and-Seek‚Äù safely.

name: Djinn: The Forbidden Knowledge
description: ‚ÄúDjinn - The Forbidden Knowledge‚Äù is a thrilling open-world horror adventure with a retro twist. Immerse yourself in this unique story as an Arabian Princess and confront your enemies in a desperate fight for survival. This is no ordinary realm, but a twisted reflection of your own trauma. To survive, you must unveil the dark secrets that lurk within, but can you conquer the demons that torment you?

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: US Presidents DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: US Presidents

name: HoloParade: DLC with BGM and Costume - Shirakami Fubuki
description: This DLC unlocks Shirakami Fubuki's swimsuit costume and the BGM "KONKON Beats" in HoloParade, and activates a gift code that allows you to scout Shirakami Fubuki. The BGM can be set for all UR talents, changing the music when the talents march to liven up the parade!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 04
description: Season 3 Episode 4: Into the Steve-Verse! Peter tries to help his brother Steve, who's stuck cheering on his insufferable boss on a Thrasher Thursday.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 05
description: Season 3 Episode 5: Love and Blunder. Katy crashes a lame old skatepark to find her best friend Blondie a cool date for prom!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 06
description: Season 3 Episode 6: G-MaVision! The twins, faced with the truth behind their parents' disappearance, finally get G-Ma back for her years abuse.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 3 - Episode 07
description: Season 3 Episode 7: Age of Ultra-Prom! Peter's ready for another flight, but Chill Haven isn't. A particularly strange prom night should fix that!

name: X8: NEO-19 White DLC
description: Blast the competition away in style with the NEO-19 White Pack!

name: Chaos Chain: Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3
description: The Supporter Cosmetic Pack 3 is for people who'd like to show some extra support for Chaos Chain and to help me continue to be able to improve the game. As a thank you, you'll receive 8 unique skins to show off your style as you descend into the shadows of Slade City!

name: Mojito the Cat: Sushi Skins
description: Expand your cube-shaped friend collection with this 4 new sushi based skins

name: Slender: The Arrival VR
description: Slender: The Arrival returns more terrifying than ever, now in VR.

name: Apollo Justice: Ace Attorney - Appeal to Truth
description: Appeal to Truth is a four-case fan game developed in PyWright, taking place in alternate timeline during the Apollo Justice era.

name: Moon Drop
description: Moon Drop is a small game created on RPG Maker VX ACE made for the Space Bunny Jam of 2019, hosted by Choko-flan. The game follows a moon spirit known as Osmond who is going out to collect his offerings after blessing his village with a successful harvest.

name: A Super Effective Turnabout
description: A Pokemon X Ace Attorney crossover fangame.

name: Hexepta: Mayor Attack
description: After a young law student named Argus Hakan ends up defending in a trial on his mentor's behalf, he is thrust into a series of cases the following week, all involving various crimes that seem to target the mayor. Argus can solve these cases as they come, but there is clearly something more going on behind the scenes.

name: Acquittal: Induction
description:
Acquittal: Induction, the first installment in a planned series, was born from inspiration from Capcom's Ace Attorney series and is in many ways a homage. Alternating between investigating criminal cases at the crime scene and defending clients in heated courtroom trials, it inherits its basic mechanics from the classic visual novel series, while taking and running with those core concepts.

It has been on an indefinite hiatus since April 06, 2018.

name: Hexepta: Logic Hack
description: Argus Hakan becomes a defense attorney at Hexepta Legal Academy, a law school that follows it's own legal system. The game was cancelled mid development.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - The Jakkid Series
description: Set in an alternate universe, Phoenix Wright must defend... anyone who needs it. Whether they live in his world or not. This game features ten extremely high-quality fanfictions made by the author Jakkid166. The game is mostly faithful to the source, including the author's writing style and language, though there are a few changes made for gameplay purposes. No censorship -- Phoenix Wright can and will say fuck!

name: Caves of Fear
description: Set in Montevideo, Uruguay in the year 1996, players assume the role of CIA agent Jack Armstrong tasked with stopping the terrorist organization World White Order before their chemical weapon is released into the world and "purifies" all of humanity. The players interact with the demo by performing actions highlighted with text messages appearing at the bottom of the screen, along with a subliminal voice in the background that queues to their possible decisions which can affect the narrative such as the getting the main character killed, and certain actions may lead to alternative scenes and endings.

name: Minecraft: Mini Game Heroes Skin Pack
description: Sin descripci√≥n

name: Scrapbook Memories
description:
Your first year attending Divine Crown Academy will be your last‚Äîtime to make the most of it!

As a new transfer student to the prestigious Divine Crown Academy, your third year of high school is sure to be one to remember. The academy‚Äôs after-school clubs are full of colorful personalities, but four students in particular catch your eye. They make fast friends, but your bond may go deeper than you expected‚Ä¶

How will you make this a year to remember?

name: Kids Station: Soreike! Anpanman
description:
Soreike Anpanman (written by Takashi Yanase, a Japanese writer of children's stories, is one of the most popular anime cartoon series in Japan. It is produced by Nippon Television Network Corporation.
The Playstation game is a collection of mini games in witch you control Anpanman in different kind of situations.

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - The Return of Ryunosuke Naruhodo
description:
Phoenix Wright has just returned to England after an exhausting adventure in the town of Labyrinthia and is ready to relax for the rest of his stay. However, he soon gets involved in a string of mysteries that lead to him reviving a great ace attorney who disappeared a hundred years ago.

Follow defence attorneys Phoenix Wright and Ryunosuke Naruhodo as they fight for their clients' lives in the Crown Court of London while seeking the truth behind the rampage of the Doctor from a hundred year's past!

name: Kai
description: KAI is a game of Exploration and Adventure between the sidereal space and underwater depths. Skillfully lure and guide groups of fish to solve puzzles, access new areas and uncover the truth behind the mission entrusted to you, Akira, and the other crew members aboard the ship.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Season 3: Wrecked
description: Ah, the wasteland‚Ä¶ the possibilities seem as vast as the grains of sand. So vast that the ‚ÄúWasteland Warriors‚Äù don‚Äôt want to give up control. This band of marauders brings a whole new meaning to scrappy crew ‚Äî each one is an automobile expert who‚Äôll tread on any rebellion. In Fortnite Battle Royale Chapter 5 Season 3: Wrecked, get in the driver‚Äôs seat and bring the Nitro to these vehicular villains!

name: Fusionfall Legacy
description: FusionFall Legacy (abbreviated as Legacy or FFL) was an in-development fangame based on Cartoon Network Universe: FusionFall, which was being developed for over five years by a team of devoted fans.

name: New Year, New Nanos
description: In Fusionfall Retro the New Year, New Nanos update was released to celebrate FusionFall's 11th anniversary. This update added a wave of 4 new World Nanos and their respective Nano Missions. All of these Nanos were based on characters only found in FusionFall.

name: Crazy Penguin Wars
description: In Crazy Penguin Wars has four players square off in turn-based battles using weapons like a Bazooka, Void Generator, or an Orbital Laser.

name: Genshin Impact: An Everlasting Dream Intertwined
description:
Version 4.7 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
‚Ä¢ New character: Clorinde, Sigewinne and Sethos
‚Ä¢ New main story quest: Chapter IV: Act VI - Bedtime Story
‚Ä¢ New story quests for Clorinde and Sigewinne
‚Ä¢ New gameplay mode: Imaginarium Theater
‚Ä¢ New quality of life features
‚Ä¢ New main event: Mutual Security Enhancing Simulation
‚Ä¢ ‚Ä¶and more!

name: Tomb of Thunder
description: 7 maps long (including a secret level) SP campaign for Quake by aDaya, using Copper 1.15 as a base while adding new features

name: Roberto el Lagarto
description: Take on an exciting stealth mission as Roberto the Lizard, a cunning thief. Use special abilities to avoid enemies while you steal valuable treasures in a museum full of challenges.

name: JASBIAC
description: A daily game where the player have to guess the genres of three albums by just their cover art

name: Home Together
description:
Home Together is a real-time adult game made in unreal engine 5

Create your own characters in an extensive character creator
Save and share creations with other players
Invite your creation to your house and have adult fun together
Play as male in first person and female in third person
Choose between many adult sex poses across the house
Voice acted female character
Experimental VR support

name: EA Sports FC Tactical
description: interactive simulation with turn-based opportunities to defend, attack, perform Skill Moves, and make attempts on target, resulting in authentic football action like never before. Every moment of gameplay empowers you through strategic decisions made on the pitch.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal
description: The Tyranny of King Washington: The Betrayal is the second of three downloadable content packs in The Tyranny of King Washington. The episode begins with Ratonhnhak√©:ton arriving in the city of Boston as a prisoner of General Israel Putnam.

name: Assassin's Creed III: Tyranny of King Washington - The Redemption
description: The Tyranny of King Washington: The Redemption is the third of three downloadable content packs in The Tyranny of King Washington.

name: Relics of the Oracle
description:
In Relics of the Oracle, step into the forgotten and the unknown in a first-person adventure that blends classic adventure mechanics with real-time 2.5D exploration. Embark on a journey through time and mystery, exploring a game that has resurfaced after decades of being lost and shrouded in urban legend.

Experience a metafictional narrative that pulls you into its depths as one of the first to rediscover this long-lost title. Navigate through hauntingly beautiful landscapes ranging from dense, whispering forests to the desolate ruins of an ancient civilization. Each environment is meticulously handcrafted to challenge your wits and reward your curiosity.

Inspired by adventure games like the Zork series, Relics of the Oracle holds that classic gameplay close to its heart and invites players to get lost in its atmosphere.

name: After Dark: Under the Moonlight
description: After Dark: Under the Moonlight is an Action Role-playing game developed and published by Game Square Interactive for Java mobile phone.

name: The Outbreak
description: "What would you do to survive?" Interactive Flash narrative game.

name: Kinito Ninja
description: Kinito Ninja is a white knuckle side scrolling action adventure. The player's goal is simple: run head long past obstacles, slash past enemies with your Katana, and get as much treasure as quickly as you can through sixty unique levels!

name: Ace Attorney - The First Turnabout Redux
description:
A fan game re-creation of the first Ace Attorney case... but (slightly) more realistic.
Visual novel-type game with dialogue choices, play as a lawyer defending your client in court, use real trial procedures such as direct examination and impeachment.

name: Office Affairs
description: Xbox Live Indie game.

name: Zombie Strippers Stole My Heart Then Ate My Brains
description: The player takes the role of Dean who, together with his friend Jake, has a job in security for a stripper convention. Suddenly the zombie apocalypse happens and the two heroes need to gear up and escape. The game has 20 levels and two types of objectives: surviving zombie waves by killing everything or surviving waves while protecting Jake because he is busy doing something else. Usually procuring new weapon types which get unlocked after beating the current level. Weapons have limited ammo (but ammo pickups frequently respawn) and later the game introduces new enemy types, e.g. one which spits acid.

name: Island Adventure 3: Penultimate Climax
description: Yet more humor and peril! Can you survive the zombies? Can you endure the girls! Will you ever make it home? A one player point and click adventure game. With multiple different endings dependent on choices made (entering codes from last game allows for even more variation!) 3D stereoscopic version included (red/cyan 3d glasses needed) Game contains some adult humor and innuendo.

name: Monkey Poo Flinger
description: Monkey Poo Flinger was developed by Derf ‚ÄòN‚Äô Derf.

name: Sexy Island Adventure
description: Can you find the girl of your dreams?

name: Turnabout Curtain
description:
Taking place two years after the events of Turnabout Succession, Apollo has been living the good life. Well, as good as you can get, considering his "boss" is as eccentric piano-playing, poker-cheating Machiavellian schemer (his daughter fairing no better); his cases filled with complication after complication, and his former mentor...

Well, we don't talk about him these days.

But that all changes when he takes a seemingly simple case of a high judge and sets in motion a chain of events that threaten to ruin Apollo and all those he holds dear...

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Legal Panels
description: Phoenix Wright: Legal Panels is a wacky, tongue in cheek hybrid crossover series based off of various other series and drawing characters from different games, comics, anime, and other sources.

name: Phoenix Wright: BEST Attorney
description: The award show has come to town and they are prepared to give awards made of rare gold to the best lawyer in Los Angeles. After debate, they narrowed the candidates for the award down to two lawyers: s spiky blue suit man named Phoenix Wright and loud red boy, Apollo Justice. Phoenix must prove himself to be the best lawyer in the country because if he doesn't win, his life may be thrown into absolute chaos!

name: Damion Shard: Ace Attorney
description: The CEO of Shard Corporation, Lord Shard, is also a renowned prosecutor, as has been his family's tradition for generations. But after a mysterious incident atop the Shard Corporation building, a cloud of secrets hanging over the past of the Shard family was revealed. Lord Shard's son, Damion, was forever changed by that incident. Soon, Damion decided to become a defense attorney, a decision that astonished his family. However, Lord Shard decided to create a small law firm so that his son could practice as a defense attorney. But with each case he takes, Damion discovers that there is quite a lot that he doesn't know about the Shard family, and eventually uncovers a dark secret about his own past...

name: Ace Gambler: Phoenix Wright
description:
Once he was an attorney, a defense attorney. First - a rookie, but with the time, he became much famous, than before. His name became of synonym of the truth and justice for those, who sought them. Until a day came when he has lost his badge and his lawyer job. Still he has found a new way in his life...
...a poker game...
While at the same time keeping his "old habits" with himself, which means his never ending search of truth and justice for all. Once - Ace Attorney, now - Ace Gambler Phoenix Wright.
Game will be won!
And Truth will be found!

name: Maya Fey's Borger Eating Simulator

name: Casey Taylor: Ace Attorney
description:

and it is a story about a recently graduated attorney who had just founded his own law firm with his grandfather.
His expertise for the moment is civil lawsuits, but he will come to learn that some insignificant looking cases can hide the biggest conspiracies.

name: Bad North: Jotunn Edition
description:
Bad North is a charming but brutal real-time tactics roguelite. Defend your idyllic island kingdom against a horde of Viking invaders, as you lead the desperate exodus of your people. Command your loyal subjects to take full tactical advantage of the unique shape of each island. Everything is at stake: fail, and watch the blood of your subjects stain the ground red.

It‚Äôs charmingly brutal, with beautiful procedurally-generated islands and adorable soldiers juxtaposed against the blood-stained realities of war. You control the broad strokes of the battle, giving high level commands to your soldiers who try their best to carry them out in the heat of the moment. It‚Äôs accessibly deep, with simple player inputs masking a dynamic combat simulation that make it inviting to new players while challenging veterans.

Keep fighting, warriors. Not for power or riches or glory, but for hope of peace to come once again in the harsh lands of the Bad North.

Complete all the steps to "discover" an ancient artifact or rare animal. Engaging hand-drawn artwork, a fun soundtrack, and addictive puzzles!

name: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Truth and Consequences
description:
Set just a few weeks after Spirit of Justice, Phoenix Wright and his friends take on five brand new cases!
Meanwhile, a notorious serial killer has come out of hiding to target Miles Edgeworth.
Can Phoenix figure out who this killer is before they come after Edgeworth himself?
And does the fact that a prosecutor from his past has returned have anything to do with this current dilemma?

A virus has taken control of the restaurant, unleashing chaos and putting our protagonist in a lot of danger from familiar faces, who will take the role of our animatronic killers.

Game made for IlloJam 2024

name: Doom: The Dark Ages

Players will step into the blood-stained boots of the DOOM Slayer, in this never-before-seen dark and sinister medieval war against Hell.

description: Lupin Sansei: Chateau de Cagliostro Saikai is an Adventure game, published by Asmik Ace Entertainment, Inc, which was released in Japan in 1997.

But nobody is going to find out.

Follow Thomas Grey, as he gets home after a long day of work at the office. Ready for nothing more then to rest and prepare for the next tiring day back at the office, he goes through his usual nightly routine. Unfortunatly for him, someone else already has different plans for him....

'The Earl Street Massacre' is a short horror game, with simple, pixelated graphics. As mentioned above, you follow Thomas Grey, going through his nightly routine, his night getting progressively worse every passing second.

name: Pet Cemetery

As he navigates the mysterious consequences, the secrets of the woods slowly unravel, revealing an eerie connection between lives. Brace yourself for a journey into the heart of rural Illinois, where a single mistake leads to a chilling and enigmatic tale that blurs the line between life and death.

name: Snoopy DS: Let's Go Meet Snoopy and His Friends!

It consists of several minigames covering a variety of gameplay types, linked together by a world in which the player can talk to Peanuts characters and perform simple quests for them.

name: Super Mario Kart Horizons
description:
Welcome to Super Mario Kart - Horizons!

Race across new courses in brand new custom locations! Drive along serene grassy plains, treacherous abandoned mines, forgotten jungle ruins, against the sunrise from a mountaintop and more! These beautiful themes and tracks have been crafted with an emphasis on aesthetics and ambience along a custom soundtrack to set the mood just right.

SMK - Horizons features:

8 custom themes. These breathtaking locations take place across the mushroom kingdom and neighboring lands!
20 well designed race tracks. Tracks have been made to be unique as possible, as well as being completely drive-able with any character at 150cc!
4 battle tracks. Enjoy a friendly competition in new battle maps that take advantage of new themes and new ideas!
Unique Ambience. All tracks each have their own color in their respective themes, meaning no tracks look entirely the same!
Brand new soundtrack. Enjoy catchy compositions for the main course themes, menu themes, credits, character victory tunes & more!
Modified Menu Screens. Featuring a new Title Screen, Cup Selection, Driver Select, Results, Podium & Credits sequence!
Revamped Sprites. Drivers, items, obstacles and more have been updated with a more modern look.
Unlock new content. Mirror Mode is available to be unlocked for all difficulties, Time Trials and Vs Mode. Think the game is too easy? Try out the unlockable hard mode to enhance your experience!
Modified Mechanics. Advance to the next round by placing 7th or higher! Points distribution have been updated as well.
And many more changes!

name: On√≠rillo

Enter the dream world and discover its deepest secrets!

Created for IlloJam.

You must infiltrate the organization's operations castle and rescue the target alive, our intelligence has reported that the team has been doing cloning experiments, possibly, their army is made up of clones of their best soldiers, you must be cautious.

Immerse yourself in a modern murder mystery adventure that feels entirely lifelike! Challenge your detective abilities by gathering clues & evidence to ultimately solve a murder case.

Sign your favorite artists, discover the talents of tomorrow, face off against other players in very short and wild duels !

name: Space Base
description:
Space Base is an action-packed tower defence game, where you aim to protect your planets from the incoming forces of enemy ships and aliens by any means necessary. Build up your defences as stronger and stronger waves of enemies arrive to reach the highest score possible.

In space base, your ever growing arsenal of towers will give you a large variety of playstyles, allowing for the player to decide what they want to go into every battle with. Alongside this, a choice of different planets, difficulties, and fun unique game-modes keep the player on their toes, making every game unique and different for a fun experience.

The game is constantly evolving, with new content being added all the time, so every time you come back there are new challenges to face with new forces to put against them. Do all you can to unlock everything and become the best space warrior you can be.

name: IPollute
description:
iPollute is a clay animated environment themed game that is played similarly to the GROW series of puzzle games. The player is presented with a fixed view of a valley and a number of icons that are used to play the game. The objective of the game is to make the valley flourish by tapping on the icons in the correct order. If unsuccessful the player will lose by either running out of icons to tap on or by triggering a major disastrous event. Each time an icon is tapped it will go up in level and it is when all icons has reached their maximum levels that the game is won.

All the icons (except for one) pollute the environment in different ways. This includes leaving garbage, building factories, cutting down trees, spilling chemicals, polluting the air and dispersing oil. The final icon is a heart which can be used to revoke damage. When one icon is tapped it can have an effect on the levels of other icons. For example building a factory can lead to more air pollution or trees being cut down. In this way all icons can be leveled to max even if they are just tapped once. When starting out levels are divided into sub-levels which means that the player manually clicks on icons to see these effects being played out. Later on a quick play mode can be unlocked where effects happen automatically.

By leveling up icons the player earns greencoins that can be used in the game store to buy hints on how to succeed with the game. By discovering different scenes the player can also earn stars which are needed to turn on the quick play mode. Greencoins can also be used to unlock a fast forward button and to reveal the current levels of the icons.

description: Phantom Dash is an open world 2D Platformer where you must collect Coins!

name: CurseBreaker
description: Trapped in this forest cursed by dark magic, you task is to seal the dark powers within these monsters and recruit them to fight for you. You must tactically wield your magic, break curses, gather monster allies, and continually strengthen your squad to survive in this cursed forest.

name: Mercapolis
description: Build and manage your own supermarket. Place orders for seasonal products, stock them on the shelves, and get ready to survive a workday full of surprises. Hire employees and keep your customers happy in Mercapolis.

name: Ponolf
description: Sad news for you. There is a fool in here. Ponolf is a multiplayer deductive game with max 12 players. Create quizzes, answer them, and discuss about the some of them to deduce who got it wrong. Is your weapon Knowledge or Strength? Well, let's start the meeting of tonight.

name: Shopping Simulator
description: "Shopping Simulator" is your ticket to a virtual mall adventure! Dive into diverse stores, manage budgets, and make friends in this nostalgic Scratch-style game. Ready to shop 'til you drop? Let's go!

name: Minna no Mozoo
description: MOZOO for Everyone is a short game that serves as a technology showcase of the latest 3D model generation AI. The enigmatic creature, MOZOO, changes its form in response to the words it learns, morphing accordingly. Join in the fun with the transformed MOZOOs in a 3D stacking puzzle game!

name: The Adventures of Prince Shiratama: Climb the Mountains
description: Aim for the top of the mountain with Prince Shiratama. Highly difficult platformer game with a casual appearance.

name: Beat Battle
description: Beat Battle is a local multiplayer rhythm game for 2-4 players! Hit the arrows in time with the music to earn power-ups that can sabotage your opponents and help you emerge from the dance battle victorious.

name: Beauty Girl Chronicles: Island Obstacle Challenge
description: On the beautiful Moon Island, an adventurous obstacle challenge is about to begin. Participants must overcome various obstacles. Only the bravest and smartest girls can emerge victorious, Let's embark on this adventure together and explore the wonderful world of courage, friendship, and victory!

name: Reincarnated as a Rookie
description: Reincarnated as a Rookie is a game of fighting monsters and leveling up. Users can obtain resources through quests to purchase and build equipment, trap pets and grow!

name: The Last Night
description: "The Last Night" is a horror point and click game, mixing 2D and 3D with a very particular pixel art style. Will you be able to make the right choices ?

name: Spark
description: You are Spark, an animated and bright bundle of energy. Through exploring an electronic maze in the depths of a computer, you come to understand your purpose in life of bringing connection, vitality, and exuberance to those around you. Spark: Virtue Through Voltage.

name: Astro Wars
description: Astro Wars is a Free Multiplayer Space Strategy Game. You start at the edge of the galaxy where you can build up, colonize and take over planets in competition with players from all over the world!

name: Sorelle
description: Welcome to the magical world of Sorelle: a whimsical 3D puzzle-platformer that immerses you in the magical seaside town of Isola Chiara. Play as sisters Alessandra, Bella, and Capri as you explore the magic of sisterhood in a puzzle-solving adventure to restore magic and save the summer festival.

name: Tunnel Escape
description: Embark on a journey to save humankind as you kick, shoot and loot your way out of a secret underground laboratory in this rogue-lite exploration RPG/ADV with strategic, turn-based combat.

name: FUBG: Fight Unknown Battleground
description: FUBG is a Multiplayer Shooter Game by GameX with Seven Different Game modes. 1. Team Death Match 2. Capture the Flag 3. Conquest 4. RUSH 5. Kill Confirmed 6. Free For All And 7. Search & Destroy. Player can Play strategic battles across diverse maps and various combat styles to claim victory.

name: Mouse Killer
description: Mouse killer - free bullet hell game which is 100% mouse only game! Kill the annoying vegetables and collect achievements.

name: A.V.A: Global - Busters Content
description: Enjoy Brand New Busters Mode. Unlock 2 Mode Stories, Play 6 Characters and more!

name: A.V.A: Global - Busters Content: Lilly Edition
description: - Receive Unique Soldier Box x 1 - Unlock 1 Character Skin: Lili Uniform. - Get 10 Ultimate Box. - Obtain Busters Game Ticket x 1.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - Purgatory
description: A choice-driven RPG thriller set in the World of Darkness universe. Step into the shoes of Samira, a young werewolf refugee in Poland, as she battles dark forces and loneliness, caught between rage and despair. How will your story unfold?

name: Chess
description: Chess: The Grand Strategy Game - Your Pocket Edition for Mastery and Fun!

name: Somnium
description: You trapped in an infinite dream loop. To reach the morning, you must carefully observe your surroundings.

name: Forge Simulator
description: You are trapped in an endless labyrinth. You must find hidden resources scattered throughout the labyrinth to craft your own sword. Overcome the dangers of the labyrinth with your crafted sword, survive, and escape.

name: War Room: Blitz
description: War Room: Blitz is a single-player, turn-based strategy game based on the historical WWII German bombing campaign conducted against the United Kingdom. Test your management skills as well as your intuition, and defend your land & protect your people.

name: Clickout
description: Introducing Clickout, a 2D Comedic Clicker game that injects humor into the traditional clicker experience! Prepare for a unique twist: The Button, your primary clickable object, assumes the role of a witty antagonist, progressively escalating its insults as you rack up clicks aka score!

name: Rat Quest
description: In this platformer, jumping will be your main mechanic as you climb the level, each jump matters, if you miss a jump, you have to restart. You may be small but so are the platforms.

name: Battleships and Carriers 2
description: Casual WW2 naval turn-based strategy: attack/defend, search & destroy, build ships, subs and aircraft. Clear and simple combat and move. Fast, re-playable board game style strategy, with 70 unit types. Different missions/campaign objectives (Destroy, Conquer, Defend, Escort, Kill-Them-All).

name: Satan Moans
description: Are you ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure with "Satan Moans"? In this horror-packed game, you'll explore the supernatural events surrounding a teenager returning home in the dead of night. Are you ready to dive into a suspenseful universe?

name: Mahjong Musou: Former Army
description: Immerse yourself in the Japanese mahjong experience with the original theme of the Three Kingdoms second dimension! Establish a deep bond with the famous heroes of the Three Kingdoms and enjoy rich voice interactions. Challenge players around the world to enjoy Mahjong fun.

name: Vlad Voievod Dracula: Dungeons of Egrigoz
description: A Classicvania (linear Metroidvania) game where you play as Vlad Tepes Dracula, the Voievode (Warlord) of Wallachia. While being a prisoner to the Ottoman Court, Dracula descends into the dungeons of Egrigoz Castle to recruit a great warrior held as prisoner by the Ottoman Turks.

name: Cats of the Tang Dynasty
description: Find the adorable cats amidst the tragic love story of Emperor Xuanzong and Consort Yang!

name: Alpine
description: Alpine is a Skiing Arcade Game where your objective is to avoid rocks and other skiers while zooming down a mountain at lightning fast speeds! Collect power ups to help you on your mission to conquer the mountain! Collect coins to purchase new gear from Badger's shop!

name: #!/Bin/Bash
description: #!/bin/bash is a typing adventure game using linux terminal commands as controls. Yum some cake, touch some loot and bash those enemies!

name: Snatched
description: Snatched plunges players into a high-stakes world where they are abducted and forced to compete in deadly card games. Set in a grim, blood-stained room, each round is a fight for survival against other captives, with the ever-present threat of violence looming.

name: Rusty Flesh
description: Rusty Flesh is a sci-fi horror puzzle platformer for the Game Boy Color where you switch gravity instead of jumping. Explore the different areas of a derelict spaceship putting together all the pieces of its lovecraftian mistery, and enjoy its retro-futuristic aesthetics.

name: Bananamania
description: Check out our all-new 8-bit banana-style game! We think you'll like it! Let us know what you think! We are working with dedication to bring this game in full to you guys very soon!

name: Contain: First Responders
description: This DLC contains the cosmetics of tactical gear of the first responder team.

name: Bugnauts!
description: Embark on a thrilling 3D projectile action adventure in Bugnauts! Swing your net to battle giant bugs and save your island home from an evil resort tycoon. Fight, collect, and explore in this action-packed game for all ages.

name: Maze Endless
description: "Maze Endless" is a challenging adventure casual game that tests your wit and luck. In this endless maze journey, players will experience an unprecedented adventure. Starting from the simplest maze, gradually challenge more complex levels, unravel their mysteries, and find the exit.

name: Sands of Supremacy
description: Sands of Supremacy is a singleplayer, side-scrolling strategy/resource management hybrid 2D game set in a desert landscape on an unknown, futuristic planet. The game combines survival, strategy, and resource management elements to create a challenging and engaging gameplay experience.

name: Bunny Space Odyssey: The Countdown
description: Seek out and collect bunny helmets scattered across the laboratory. But wait, bunny helmets with ears? Perhaps the veil of mystery will be lifted, revealing why we're collecting these ear-topped helmets?

name: Hidden Arcade
description: Find the 300 hidden Ghosts spread throughout 3 different Arcade Game Worlds!

name: Apples And Bananas
description: Embark on an epic fruit-filled adventure as Jack the Apple, battling brainwashed banana soldiers in this top-down 2D pixel shooter to stop Dr. Banana's evil plans!

name: Kidnelis
description: Truths, lies & imagination. Improve your short term memory, understanding, concentration & literacy skills. Read, choose, replicate and more importantly: when in doubt, discuss!

name: Clawpunk
description: Clawpunk is a challenging, fast-paced, melee 2D action game with roguelite elements and multiple characters, where the player can run rampant in a destructible environment that rewards a reactive and aggressive play style.

name: Echoes of Extinction
description: Open World Prehistoric Horror Survival set on a mysterious island inhabited by dinosaurs and tribal humans. Survival is a test of resilience and adaptability. Players must carve their path in this challenging world, competing for territory, resources and ultimately, their own survival.

name: Farmer's Shop Simulator
description: Create your own farm. Harvest crops, take care of animals, sell goods, set prices at your discretion, hire staff, expand, design, and build your dream farm.

name: Interwoven Emotions
description: Indie narrative puzzle platformer where you follow the character along their journey of defeating emotions and finding purpose.

name: Guns Demons
description: Get ready to dive into explosive action and pure adrenaline with Guns Demons, the vehicular combat game that redefines the genre. In this thrilling universe, cars don't just race‚Äîthey're armed with a devastating array of firearms, ready to unleash chaos on the road.

name: Lost Souls
description: Lost souls is a short first-person indie horror game where you solve puzzles, encounter creepy scares, and uncover the tragedy that befell your family, all in a sinister yet compelling atmosphere which traps you in the home of the Ambrus.

name: Animal Tracker
description: Explore a fantastical island where fantastical new creatures await! Run, jump, and glide your way to discover new animals to photograph and become the next great Emergent Organism Researcher in this single-player island exploration game! What surprises await you on the island?

name: Philosophers Lab
description: Navigate this robot's intricately designed home, immerse yourself in a calming Lo-Fi soundtrack, and interact with a rich selection of literature for relaxation and focused study in this interactive exploration experience.

name: Wind Rider: Military Outfit
description: This is a cosmetic DLC which contains (Military hat, Military Cape, Military Boots). you can use any of the items to customize the appearance of your character.

name: Master of Fried Rice
description: Fried rice‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîWok stir-frying‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚ÄîRice dynamism realized by physics calculation! Complete the best fried rice by using various ingredients!

name: Whispers of the Eyeless
description: Guide your Cult. Oversee your Sanctum. Stay in the Shadows. Serve the Dead Gods.

name: Lost Estate Agent
description: Lost Estate Agent - is a survival horror game a real atmosphere of abandoned mansion.

name: Nox Machina
description: Pilot a lone ship through the moon's core to shut down a lunar doomsday factory in this sci-fi deckbuilding game. Power up your cards and equipment to neutralize humanity's greatest threat... if you can survive the journey.

name: Rine: The Trail of Fireflies
description: Embark yourself in a journey about light, fireflies and a cute little blue fox. Help Rine befriend the fireflies along the way. They will guide him to solve the mystery of the missing light.

name: Dance Junkie
description: Dance Junkie is a full body Rhythm Smasher game that turns your webcam or smartphone into a motion capture system. Experience full body tracking without expensive equipment while you move your body in an immersive world. Your goal is to pop tune bubbles, and you'll need rhythm to be successful.

name: Loop: ClassRoom
description: Every school has some terrifying rumors, and you certainly don't want to be a part of these rumors.

name: Survive It: Frozen - Additional Characters Pack
description: Unlock the Doctor, Solider, Businesswoman and Farmer character for Survive It: Frozen. Thanks to this DLC you can play Survive It: Frozen with completely new character combinations and try out different build orders, tailored to your selected characters.

name: Nucleares: New Generator Set
description: This state-of-the-art generator boasts a 50% longer lifespan compared to other models, ensuring reliable and long-lasting performance.

name: ArchWilio
description: Our protagonist finds themselves stranded in a dense forest, desperately seeking your guidance to escape this verdant labyrinth.

name: Night Town
description: "In this game you're a resident of Night Town, a town where sleeping at night is taboo. What's really happening there?The game addresses the issue as subtle and bright as possible, it won't be too dark on the road ahead. There is mystery, and there is love.So, how will you choose?"

name: Crying Room
description: be sorrow like dev! he just a weirdo... of course and his computer really suck so bad that making game so on low resolution!.... how ironic is that :\

name: Gate Guardian
description: Gate Guardian is a casual fantasy roguelike with rich build options. You are the guardian of the Gate of Life, who protects it from Death. Create combinations of skills, improve and radically change them with modifiers. Survive Death!

name: Catonium: Out of Chaos
description: Unravel the mysteries of Catonium, a medieval fantasy world on the brink of chaos. In the wake of "The Fall," a cataclysmic event that shattered the realm a decade ago. Ancient ruins, cities, and vast landscapes await your exploration. Forge your path, uncover secrets, and shape the future.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Berlin-Tegel
description: Our airport Berlin-Tegel for X-Plane offers a very accurate and realistic recreation of the airport with high-detailed models and textures.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Berlin Brandenburg V2
description: Being infamous for its construction delays, the German capital's new airport is finally open and available for X-Plane!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Helgoland
description: Helgoland XP is a scenery for X-Plane that recreates Germany's only island in the open sea at a high level of detail and with many thrilling new options.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - St. Tropez
description: Based on the latest image sources, highly detailed objects were created at and along the airport. In addition, the villages La Mole and Le Moulin Roux were upgraded with individual autogen. The photo texture covers an area of approx. 26km¬≤ and thus covers the entire traffic pattern.

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Zurich V2.0
description: The Airport Zurich is the largest airport of Switzerland, now in a brand new version for X-Plane. This completely new scenery is full of details, including every building and the entire airport environment, De-Icing and all features you would expect from a modern X-Plane scenery.

name: Undersea 8
description: You are trapped in a dangerous undersea ruin. Let's escape from the deep sea with observation and quick situational judgment.

name: Hell's Underground
description: Descend into the eerie depths of the London Underground in this spine-chilling horror game. Navigate through claustrophobic tunnels and ominous sewers while evading terrifying monsters. Every step brings you closer to escape... or to your doom.

name: No Work No Life
description: This game is a roguelike horror game. Beyond the door lies a completely white space where you must pick up items, offer them as sacrifices, and survive for as long as possible.

name: Humay
description: It is a fantastic adventure game.

name: Colonies of The Remnant
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, found and develop your own colony under the threat of the undead. Be cautious against enemy colonies or form alliances. Engage in action-fueled battles against the undead and other humans using FPS or TPS game modes. Formulate your strategy and survive!

name: Habitants
description: Habitants is an open-world survival game for 1-8 players. Set on a tumultuous planet, players must contend with mysterious alien races, survive in the midst of powerful factions vying for dominance, and build your own base through construction, combat, and strategy.

name: Raid Run
description: Raid Run is a game inspired by fake mobile game ads. Your character automatically travels through the level where you must face increasingly difficult enemies, grabbing power ups and evolving your skills along the way. Attacks and skills are fired automatically. Conquer 3 levels with 3 difficulties.

name: Heroic Assault
description: Heroic Assault is a reverse tower defense game where you prepare your army to go through the infested lands of defenses. Choose wisely your units depending on the layout of the defenses and equip them with unique abilities.

name: Slum Dweller
description: Slum Dweller is a physics-based fighting game about typical situations that slum dwellers encounters on a daily basis. Try on the role of a slum dweller trying to survive in a harsh criminal environment or a street fighter taking part in underground tournaments.

name: Meow Moments: Olympicats
description: Join the Olympicats in Meow Moments: Celebrating Together! Celebrate sportsmanship and unity with cats and characters from around the world. Enjoy diverse sports, peaceful competition, and the joy of friendly games.

name: Floink Yoink
description: Embark on an endless journey through the fiery skies in "Floink Yoink", where the only goal is to reach the highest score imaginable! Take control of a brave pig with wings as you navigate an ever-changing landscape of flaming pipes, each flap bringing you closer to become crispy bacon!

name: AutoBulletSurvivor
description: Jump into the world of AutoBulletSurvivor! Survive on a post-apocalyptic surface devastated by nuclear war. Collect items, evade powerful enemies, and gather supplies for the underground shelter. Grow stronger with each run and experience the thrill of survival.

name: Survivor World
description: Conquer obstacles, and strategies for victory. Blue vs. red teams race to a goal, relying on intellect and skill, not wilderness survival. Only team success counts. Ready for the ultimate showdown?

name: Rustwing
description: Rustwing is a twin stick shooter rougelike, where you play as a mercenary spaceship sent on a journey across the habited space. Navigate from star to star, battle the scattered factions of humanity, customize your weaponry, acquire powerful upgrades and become a legendary pilot!

name: Nightmare Files: Clap Clap
description: Clap Clap is a short indie horror game that puts you in the shoes of a house sitter, experiencing strange occurrences in a seemingly ordinary home.

name: Cats Clicker
description: The cutest game in the world. Cats and kittens with idle clicker gameplay. Meow!

name: One Box One Goal
description:
You're in a box and you have to climb as high as possible... if you can make it.
One Box One Goal is a game inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy but made in third person.

name: Whisker President
description: Whisker President is a comedic, casual point-and-click game set in a cartoon style oval office. Armed with only a laser pointer and some glue, help the purresident achieve political success by making him stamp the bills, all while ensuring that distractions don't get in the way.

name: The Mare of Jonah
description: A first-person psychological horror/mystery adventure where you play as a small boy trapped in an unknown and dark mansion. Try to survive the vengeful evil spirits lurking in the dark while exploring the rooms and corridors in hopes of finding clues that may lead to a way out of this horror.

name: Doot-Type
description: 2D Side Scrolling Shoot Em Up action. Cinematic cut-scenes carry the story on a quest to locate Mother Gator's secret weapon. Unlockable cheats will mix-up the gameplay or enjoy a randomizer mode. Game includes commentary by the developer and musical composer on the process of making the game!

name: Touhou Scarlet Diabolique Fantastica
description: Touhou Scarlet Diabolique Fantastica brings the popular Japanese Touhou series back to arcades worldwide in a remake of Embodiment of Scarlet Devil (Touhou Episode 6).

name: KartMania Silver
description: Invite your friends to have fun with you playing KartMania! A Kart game where you race around the tracks in the universe of Silver Games games, use and abuse special items to get ahead of your friends and thus win first place! Speed ‚Äã‚Äãto glory in KartMania Silver!

name: Hard Void
description: Lead your space-faring species across galaxies and multiple dimensions to build an Empire in this strategy game. Design your spaceships, assemble your fleets and fight for the supremacy. Colonize planets, asteroids and the space itself! but beware, you aren't only dealing with just other species.

name: Labyrinth Hotel
description: Labyrinth Hotel is an immersive, first-person, action-adventure game where the player wakes up locked in a jail cell and must escape, but the only way out is through the Hotel. Contains 20 unique levels, 4 bosses, many unique characters, a cool crt effect, and many secret levels.

name: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time
description: The Remake of the End of the Greatest RPG of All Time is the last hour of a lost (nonexistent) JRPG, "remade‚Äù in 3D pixel art complete with director‚Äôs commentary, the digital manual, and archival footage.

name: Surgit
description: In the dark corners of virtual reality, where nightmares merge with reality, lies Surgit a heart-pounding horror experience that will test your courage and survival instincts. Step into the abyss, where every shadow hides a malevolent force, and your only chance of escape is to fight back.

name: Pimic of Sorrow
description: "The Magic Mirror will destroy the world... Someone has told the Ice Queen the whereabouts of the Magic Mirror." Embark on a mysterious journey to save the Magic Mirror from the Ice Queen. An RPG woven with poetic storytelling and fairy tale-style pixel art graphics.

name: Fantasmigon
description: Fantasmigon is an original turn-based strategy set in a vibrant fantasy world. Engage in thrilling battles and tactical gameplay as you lead your band of characters through challenging encounters

name: Proyecto infernal
description: Infernal Project offers a real survival challenge. Survive in a toxic volcanic arena. Face random enemy waves, collect scarce resources, and make strategic decisions to stay alive. Test your endurance and see how long you can last in this intense survival simulator.

name: Pantless
description: Pantless brings a hilarious twist to the rage-inducing game genre inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy. In this third-person, physics-based game, players control customizable characters hilariously devoid of pants, navigating through chaotic and fun challenges.

name: HyperFantasy Mimesis
description: Deconstruction of an RPG. Monsters are gone. Humanity doesn't want to be saved. Your biggest enemy will be the UI.

name: Rastignac The Homeless
description: "Rastignac The Homeless" plunges you into a survival horror nightmare in an urban city overrun by zombies. Scavenge, fight, and drive your way through the quarantine zone to escape. Every move could be your last in this gripping tale of desperation and survival.

name: Seal the Rift
description: Discover an endlessly replayable roguelike deckbuilder. Craft a unique deck to overcome the challenges ahead. Collect powerful relics, harness potent magic and skillfully make use of the "Boost" mechanic to Seal the Rift!

name: Set Sail! Arena
description: Set Sail! Arena is a 4v4 PVP Arena Action game. Face off against your friends as Pirates or British, across unique maps and modes. Customise your character and fight with swords, pistols and a variety of Power Weapons!

name: Foul
description: Foul is a survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Fight off the infected. Gather loot to survive. Explore various locations. Try to survive in this harsh environment for as long as you can!

name: SongBird: FlingAThing
description: A unique, stylish platformer based around flinging yourself as fast as possible in any direction. Venture deep into the "Songbird Short Stop" to fix a cash register that won't scan milk in this exhilarating precision platformer.

name: Sparrow
description: Trapped in a mysterious mansion, a tiny sparrow must survive deadly encounters with horrific creatures as it unravels the mansion's dark secrets and desperately tries to escape. Explore vents, crawlspaces, secret rooms, and more to uncover the gripping story and world of Sparrow.

name: Split Decision
description: Morals meet profits in Split Decision, where you play as a boxing judge who tries to move up in the world of sports, corruption and bribery.

name: Luna's Eyes
description: A first-person horror adventure set in a red-tinted otherworld. Use clues from Luna the cat to escape from the otherworldly house.

name: Spice Trade
description: Spice Trade offers a chance to rewrite history with Abu, a young man challenging European dominance. As he inherits land in Baghdad, Abu enters the spice trade to thwart European trade monopoly. Can he reshape Europe's fate? You decide the outcome in this game of strategy and empire-building!

name: Aikyam
description: Dazzle the hearts of disgruntled villagers with extravagant turn-based battles and rally them against demons in this Bollywood-inspired fantasy RPG!

name: [REC] Paroxysm
description: You're a horror content creator, venturing into frightening locations to captivate your audience. You're attempting to attract more viewers by recording paranormal events. However, these horror-filled adventures will one day come back to haunt you, at a high cost.

name: Carpe Dino: Seize the Date
description: ‚ÄúCarpe Dino: Seize the Date‚Äù is a journey back in time with a romantic twist. Face the dangers of ancient Pangea, get involved in a few intrigues, and choose a mate to get through the Great Dying. Be ready to decide the future of the entire Dinosaur world‚Ä¶ World, which is wider than you imagined.

name: Evilspunk
description: VR Action Rogue-Like shooter game. Dark enemies , Steampunk universe and fast paced gameplay. How well can you defend the church? Shed light on the darkness. The fate of humanity is at the tip of your barrel.

name: Horrible Dream
description: You find yourself in an abandoned military town, from which all its inhabitants have disappeared due to unexplained circumstances. You will need to find out what happened, but unexplained phenomena will occur during the investigation. This journey will change the main character forever.

name: K!ll All Litterbugs
description: Headbox Games, in association with the Gambler 500 and Sons of Smokey, needs your help to save the planet! No one knows exactly where these toxic monsters came from, but you'll discover the sinister plot while you run and drive your way through this open world action game.

name: Mountain Boy
description: Ascend to new heights and conquer all the peaks in the world of Mountain Boy!

name: Planet Prospector
description: An open World Space Logistics Simulator set in the future where humanity have just started the BIG colonization effort of a new found world. experience seamless space to planet flight. Manage fuel economy and jump ranges as you fly across fully scaled planets and moons delivering cargo.

name: Funky Panic Attack
description: Can Luna navigate this funky world to find Halloween? - Talk to strange and compelling characters! Freeze obstacles and activate the fast Chili Pepper Mode, but beware - it also makes you uncontrollably jumpy!

name: Bunny Alice in Wonderland
description: On this fantastical journey, you will use your extraordinary observation skills and, along with your companions, overcome all obstacles and challenges, bravely moving forward!

name: Hellfire Rampage VR
description: HELLFIRE RAMPAGE is a thrilling VR adventure where you, as the inventor of teleportation, hunt for crystal essences to unlock a portal to dangerous dungeons. Battle hellish creatures using a vast arsenal of interdimensional weapons. Unique combat mechanics and challenges are awaiting!

name: Anubis
description: Anubis, the god of the underworld, received order from God Ra. The army of the desert god Seth, who became stronger, invaded the ancient world. To stop Seth, Anubis will capture the desert fire and destroy Seth's army.

name: Land of Symbiosis
description: Online cooperative or solo survival and action RPG set in a procedural alien world. Explore, survive, battle bosses and gather resources to customize your equipment and defend your bases from creatures drawn by the electromagnetism of your technology.

name: Alchemy Mastery
description: A game where you take part in an immersive chemical laboratory simulation. Produce various mixtures using equipment and substances. Use mostly mouse controls to pour chemicals from vessel to vessel.

name: Lunar Resilience
description: Lunar Resilience ‚Äì Survive the werewolves, build your fortress, craft items and weaponry, hunt animals, feed yourself, hydrate yourself and stay resilient.Explore and uncover the island‚Äôs mysteries. If you're afraid to go alone, feel free to invite your friends to go with you.

name: Metal Dogs: New Dog Addition - Labrador Retriever
description: This is a DLC that adds playable dog breeds to the shooting action game "METAL DOGS".

name: Songs of Conquest: Rise Eternal
description: Embrace the darkness in your endeavor to crush the Stouthearts. Raise the dead to serve once more. For the scholars of Loth know that death is not the end, it is merely the beginning.

name: Journey to Earth
description: You are an experienced astronaut, stranded in space. Will you reach Earth, or will you get lost in space and die?

name: Arsene Lupin: Once a Thief
description: Witness the Origins of a Legend - Experience Ars√®ne Lupin's transformation from humble burglar to folklore hero in Ars√®ne Lupin: Once A Thief, a detective adventure game set in the early 1900s.

name: Idylls of the Lunar Maria
description: Idylls of the Lunar Maria is a charming "match-3 builder" roguelite adventure. Chat with rats, defeat demons.

name: The Era of Pioneers
description: "The Era of Pioneers" is a combination of simulation operation, RPG, turn-based, card-type, Rougelite indie, covering agriculture, farming, business management and many other aspects. Players experience their lives by playing as various characters.

name: Rising Army
description: A strategy camp sim game where you manage and command your army, training each individual troop and upgrading your camp. Satisfy your King by completing missions and epic battles against enemies. Lead your Lord to legend!

name: Safelight
description: Safelight is the debut first-person puzzle horror game from STEALTH Studios. Navigate through a vacant cruise ship stuck at sea, as you uncover the mystery of how entire portions of the ship have vanished.

name: Monster: Titan's Playground
description: Devastate a fully-destructible city in VR as a giant monster. Battle mechs using your various breath, ranged, and melee weapons‚Äîincluding fire breath, gravity cannon, and lock-on missile pods.

name: From Fire Emergence
description: Survive unspeakable nightmares in this third person action-horror.
